00016 #ifndef B3_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR
00017 #define B3_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR
00018 
00022 
00023 #include "b3Scalar.h"
00024 //#define B3_DEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOCATIONS 1
00025 #ifdef B3_DEBUG_MEMORY_ALLOCATIONS
00026 
00027 #define b3AlignedAlloc(a,b) \
00028                 b3AlignedAllocInternal(a,b,__LINE__,__FILE__)
00029 
00030 #define b3AlignedFree(ptr) \
00031                 b3AlignedFreeInternal(ptr,__LINE__,__FILE__)
00032 
00033 void*   b3AlignedAllocInternal  (size_t size, int alignment,int line,char* filename);
00034 
00035 void    b3AlignedFreeInternal   (void* ptr,int line,char* filename);
00036 
00037 #else
00038         void*   b3AlignedAllocInternal  (size_t size, int alignment);
00039         void    b3AlignedFreeInternal   (void* ptr);
00040 
00041         #define b3AlignedAlloc(size,alignment) b3AlignedAllocInternal(size,alignment)
00042         #define b3AlignedFree(ptr) b3AlignedFreeInternal(ptr)
00043 
00044 #endif
00045 typedef int     btSizeType;
00046 
00047 typedef void *(b3AlignedAllocFunc)(size_t size, int alignment);
00048 typedef void (b3AlignedFreeFunc)(void *memblock);
00049 typedef void *(b3AllocFunc)(size_t size);
00050 typedef void (b3FreeFunc)(void *memblock);
00051 
00053 void b3AlignedAllocSetCustom(b3AllocFunc *allocFunc, b3FreeFunc *freeFunc);
00055 void b3AlignedAllocSetCustomAligned(b3AlignedAllocFunc *allocFunc, b3AlignedFreeFunc *freeFunc);

00057 
00060 template < typename T , unsigned Alignment >
00061 class b3AlignedAllocator {
00062         
00063         typedef b3AlignedAllocator< T , Alignment > self_type;
00064         
00065 public:
00066 
00067         //just going down a list:
00068         b3AlignedAllocator() {}
00069         /*
00070         b3AlignedAllocator( const self_type & ) {}
00071         */
00072 
00073         template < typename Other >
00074         b3AlignedAllocator( const b3AlignedAllocator< Other , Alignment > & ) {}
00075 
00076         typedef const T*         const_pointer;
00077         typedef const T&         const_reference;
00078         typedef T*               pointer;
00079         typedef T&               reference;
00080         typedef T                value_type;
00081 
00082         pointer       address   ( reference        ref ) const                           { return &ref; }
00083         const_pointer address   ( const_reference  ref ) const                           { return &ref; }
00084         pointer       allocate  ( btSizeType        n   , const_pointer *      hint = 0 ) {
00085                 (void)hint;
00086                 return reinterpret_cast< pointer >(b3AlignedAlloc( sizeof(value_type) * n , Alignment ));
00087         }
00088         void          construct ( pointer          ptr , const value_type &   value    ) { new (ptr) value_type( value ); }
00089         void          deallocate( pointer          ptr ) {
00090                 b3AlignedFree( reinterpret_cast< void * >( ptr ) );
00091         }
00092         void          destroy   ( pointer          ptr )                                 { ptr->~value_type(); }
00093         
00094 
00095         template < typename O > struct rebind {
00096                 typedef b3AlignedAllocator< O , Alignment > other;
00097         };
00098         template < typename O >
00099         self_type & operator=( const b3AlignedAllocator< O , Alignment > & ) { return *this; }
00100 
00101         friend bool operator==( const self_type & , const self_type & ) { return true; }
00102 };
00103 
00104 
00105 
00106 #endif //B3_ALIGNED_ALLOCATOR
